name: Evalgator
description: Evalgator is an AI-powered platform for candidate assessment and recruitment. Major modules include an applicant tracking system, a comprehensive assessments module, and a collaborative coding interview module. Evalgator leverages AI, automation, and host of other robust features to simplify and speed up the hiring process while ensuring the integrity of assessments and quality of hires. For a platform packed with features, it is very user-friendly and affordably priced. Its versatility makes it an ideal solution for both technical and non-technical hiring as well other assessment needs.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: All-in-one Talent Assessment Platform
ShortDescription: Hire the right talent with our digital assessment and evaluation platform.
enhanced_description: Evalgator is an AI-powered, all-in-one talent assessment and recruitment platform designed to simplify and accelerate the hiring process. It integrates core HR tech functionalities including a full applicant tracking system (ATS), a comprehensive assessments module, and a collaborative coding interview module. Leveraging AI and automation, Evalgator ensures the integrity of assessments and helps improve the quality of hires. Its user-friendly interface and affordable pricing, combined with its versatility for both technical and non-technical roles, make it suitable for various assessment needs, including campus recruitment, lateral hiring, employee assessment, and pre-hire training with virtual lab capabilities.
key_use_cases: Delivering pre-hire training using virtual labs
competitive_advantages: Integration of ATS, assessments, and coding interviews in one platform
Simplifies and speeds up the hiring process
Aids in improving the quality of hires
Versatility for both technical and non-technical hiring
